text:
I have a webapp with the following in web.xml:

  <display-name>Diagnostics Portal Application</display-name>

As a consequence, ServletContext.getServletContextName() returns
   "Diagnostics Portal Application",
which renders the method pretty useless.

IMO, the purpose of the method would be to allow various deployments of the same
webapp to detect the different deployment names (aka context path). AFAICT, there
is currently no supported possibility to detect the context path.
creator: jochen@apache.org
